description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Dromedary, an interactive cartoon-based camel oriented action adventure! Maybe one of a kind!!  You and your trusty steed are 200 miles from home and on the wrong side of the desert.  Chased by lions and cunning natives, tormented by mother-nature herself you must use your wit and guile to get home.
description.short: Dromedary, an interactive cartoon-based camel oriented action adventure! Maybe one of a kind!!  You and your trusty steed are 200 miles from home and on the wrong side of the desert.  Chased by lions and cunning natives, tormented by mother-nature herself you must use your wit and guile to get home.
